actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: To declare the policy of the United States with respect to deployment of a National Missile Defense System.
short_title: Security Against Nuclear Enemies Act of 2001

summary.text: Security Against Nuclear Enemies Act of 2001 - Requires the Secretary of Defense to direct the Director of the Ballistic Missile Defense Organization, as soon as technologically possible, to design and deploy a land- and sea-based national missile defense system capable of defending the national territory of the United States against ballistic missile attack.

titles.title: Security Against Nuclear Enemies Act of 2001
To declare the policy of the United States with respect to deployment of a National Missile Defense System.
